${ModID}:CowardiceQuest.TITLE: Coward's Path
${ModID}:CowardiceQuest.DESCRIPTION: Avoid an Elite encounter 3 times. (When offered an Elite Combat, choose a different path.)

${ModID}:NeatQuest.TITLE: Organized Deck
